story.name: World Suicide Prevention Day - A Statement
story.content: {"_uid":"644dd48e-c398-4683-868e-57d963c35427","body":[{"_uid":"916de019-bc1c-416b-8e5f-fcf4f68dde62","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"World Suicide Prevention Day - September 10th","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Tomorrow, we are raising awareness for those struggling and doing walk and talks to bring people in the community together, which this weekend will be as needed more than ever.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"The Queen dedicated her life to service above all else, the ultimate show of respect from us to her is to carry on serving.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"What better way in a moment of mourning than to bring people together to walk and talk and tell them where they can get support should they need further support. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If anybody is feeling low or disoriented by yesterday's news, feel free to join us if you need company at this time. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"People are still struggling, and it is vital that they have support in place should they need it. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"As it stands - our groups Monday will remain open.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Let’s focus on a big weekend of awareness raising, and being there for people, and then focus on getting our doors open on Monday.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"One in all in - AMC.","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"2adab7cf-b8d8-4b2b-bbd9-4c7ec03e823f","items":["8eb38a6f-7a5c-43a8-b283-6a736e47e4e9","e9512c4f-078a-4425-a019-dc47dd81ed8c","5e58f4ec-ec05-4672-9f97-b159fdce92cb"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"725544c7-6deb-4f94-a6a9-de12923cb0dc","title":"Introducing Boys in Mind","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"Introducing Boys in Mind - a CIC devoted to helping reduce the rate of suicide in children and young adults!"},"component":"news_views","description":"A statement ahead of World Suicide Prevention Day - September 10th","featured_image":{"id":5767577,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/940x788/309a324e63/world-suicide-prevention-day_ed.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"}}

story.name: World Suicide Prevention Day - A Statement
story.content: {"_uid":"644dd48e-c398-4683-868e-57d963c35427","body":[{"_uid":"916de019-bc1c-416b-8e5f-fcf4f68dde62","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"World Suicide Prevention Day - September 10th","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Tomorrow, we are raising awareness for those struggling and doing walk and talks to bring people in the community together, which this weekend will be as needed more than ever.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"The Queen dedicated her life to service above all else, the ultimate show of respect from us to her is to carry on serving.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"What better way in a moment of mourning than to bring people together to walk and talk and tell them where they can get support should they need further support. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If anybody is feeling low or disoriented by yesterday's news, feel free to join us if you need company at this time. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"People are still struggling, and it is vital that they have support in place should they need it. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"As it stands - our groups Monday will remain open.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Let’s focus on a big weekend of awareness raising, and being there for people, and then focus on getting our doors open on Monday.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"One in all in - AMC.","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"2adab7cf-b8d8-4b2b-bbd9-4c7ec03e823f","items":["8eb38a6f-7a5c-43a8-b283-6a736e47e4e9","e9512c4f-078a-4425-a019-dc47dd81ed8c","5e58f4ec-ec05-4672-9f97-b159fdce92cb"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"725544c7-6deb-4f94-a6a9-de12923cb0dc","title":"Introducing Boys in Mind","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"Introducing Boys in Mind - a CIC devoted to helping reduce the rate of suicide in children and young adults!"},"component":"news_views","description":"A statement ahead of World Suicide Prevention Day - September 10th","featured_image":{"id":5767577,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/940x788/309a324e63/world-suicide-prevention-day_ed.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"}}
